languages.text: "Но не слишком ли опасно выставлять такую вещь во дворце? Вдруг она несет порчу?"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Это конечно круто, но зачем такое выставлять во дворце?

languages.text: "But isn't it too dangerous to display something like this in the palace? What if it brings blight upon us?"
languages.original_text: "Но не слишком ли опасно выставлять такую вещь во дворце? Вдруг она несет порчу?"

traits.locale_text: "But isn't it too dangerous to be displaying something like this in the palace? What if it brings blight upon us?"
"But isn't it too dangerous to be displaying something like this in the palace? What if it brings blight upon us?"
"But isn't it too dangerous to display something like this in the palace? What if it brings blight upon us?"
"But isn't it too dangerous to display something like this in the palace? What if it brings blight upon us?"
"But isn't it too dangerous to display something like this in the palace? What if it brings blight upon us?"

languages.text: “不过，把这样的东西展示在宫殿里，是不是太危险了？如果它给我们招致灾祸，该怎么办？”
languages.original_text: "But isn't it too dangerous to display something like this in the palace? What if it brings blight upon us?"

traits.locale_text: “不过，把这样的东西展示在宫殿里，是不是太危险了？如果它给我们招致灾祸，该怎么办？”

languages.text: «¿Y no será peligroso tener algo así en el palacio? ¿Y si hace caer una plaga sobre nosotros?».
languages.original_text: "But isn't it too dangerous to display something like this in the palace? What if it brings blight upon us?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y no será peligroso tener algo así en el palacio? ¿Y si hace caer una plaga sobre nosotros?».

languages.text: 「しかし、こんなものを宮殿に飾るのはあまりに危険じゃないか？我々に災いをもたらすかもしれないぞ？」
languages.original_text: "But isn't it too dangerous to display something like this in the palace? What if it brings blight upon us?"

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、こんなものを宮殿に飾るのはあまりに危険じゃないか？我々に災いをもたらすかもしれないぞ？」

languages.text: "Aber ist es nicht zu gefährlich, so etwas im Palast auszustellen? Was, wenn es uns Zerstörung bringt?"
languages.original_text: "But isn't it too dangerous to display something like this in the palace? What if it brings blight upon us?"

traits.locale_text: "Aber ist es nicht zu gefährlich, so etwas im Palast auszustellen? Was, wenn es uns Zerstörung bringt?"

languages.text: « Mais n'est-ce pas risqué d'exhiber de telles choses dans le palais ? Et si un désastre s'abattait sur nous ? »
languages.original_text: "But isn't it too dangerous to display something like this in the palace? What if it brings blight upon us?"

traits.locale_text: « Mais n'est-ce pas risqué d'exhiber de telles choses dans le palais ? Et si un désastre s'abattait sur nous ? »

languages.text: "Sarayda böyle bir şey sergilemek çok tehlikeli değil mi? Ya üzerimize felaketler çökmesine sebep olursa?"
languages.original_text: "But isn't it too dangerous to display something like this in the palace? What if it brings blight upon us?"

traits.locale_text: "Sarayda böyle bir şey sergilemek çok tehlikeli değil mi? Ya üzerimize felaketler çökmesine sebep olursa?"
